glsa.title: Tor: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Tor, allowing attackers to cause Denial of Service or obtain sensitive information.

background.p: Tor is an implementation of second generation Onion Routing, a connection-oriented anonymizing communication service.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Tor. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Tor users should upgrade to the latest version:
